title: Clash Converter

subtitle.proxies-to-yaml: Convert proxy links to Clash YAML format
subtitle.yaml-to-proxies: Extract proxy links from Clash YAML

inputPlaceholder.proxies-to-yaml:
Paste your proxy links here - one per line

Supported protocols:

hysteria://server:port?protocol=udp&auth=xxx&peer=xxx#Hysteria-Node
hysteria2://password@server:port/?sni=xxx#Hysteria2-Node
ss://[base64]#SS-Node
ssr://[base64]#SSR-Node
vmess://[base64]#Vmess-Node
vless://uuid@server:port?encryption=none&security=tls&type=tcp#Vless-Node
trojan://password@server:port#Trojan-Node
socks5://server:port#Socks5-Node
http://user:pass@server:port#Http-Node

ðŸ’¡ Tip: The #name suffix becomes the proxy name in your YAML file
inputPlaceholder.yaml-to-proxies:
proxies:
  - name: SS-HongKong
    type: ss
    server: hk.example.com
    port: 443
  - name: VMESS-US
    type: vmess
    server: us.example.com
    port: 443

proxy-groups:
  - name: PROXY
    type: select
    proxies: ...

clash-meta.title: Clash Meta (Mihomo)
clash-meta.description: The continuation of Clash Meta with the latest features and protocol support.
features: Supports all protocols including VLESS, Hysteria, Hysteria2
Used by Clash Verge and other modern clients

clash-premium.title: Clash Premium
clash-premium.description: The original Clash core (formerly Clash for Windows kernel). No longer actively maintained.
features: Does NOT support VLESS, Hysteria, Hysteria2
Stable but outdated, last updated in 2023
Only choose if your client requires it

protocolFiltered: {count} {protocol} node(s) filtered out (not supported by Clash Premium)

outputPlaceholder.proxies-to-yaml: # Your Clash config will appear here
outputPlaceholder.yaml-to-proxies: # Your proxy links will appear here
